channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Tealeaf Customer Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Tealeaf Customer Experience

item.title: CVE-2017-1279|2024-08-05T13:32:28.494Z -- ibm -- tealeaf%20customer%20experience
item.description: IBM Tealeaf Customer Experience 8.7, 8.8, and 9.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 124757.

item.title: CVE-2017-1204|2024-08-05T13:25:17.403Z -- ibm -- tealeaf%20customer%20experience
item.description: IBM Tealeaf Customer Experience 8.7, 8.8, and 9.0.2 contains hard-coded credentials. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to the system. IBM X-Force ID: 123740.
